thread.title: LeBron XIII & Curry 2's Available Now in NBA 2K16
thread.title_full: LeBron XIII & Curry 2's Available Now in NBA 2K16

author: Steve_OS
title: LeBron XIII & Curry 2's Available Now in NBA 2K16
text: LeBron XIII & Curry 2's Available Now in NBA 2K16 02:35 PM - October 21, 2015 by Steve_OS The LeBron XIII and Curry 2's are available now in NBA 2K16. For those of you that are interested, you can edit the shoes and equip them when editing your roster. For those of you wanting to purchase them for your MyPLAYER, here are the prices. LeBron XIII - 2,750 VC # 1 DBMcGee3 @ 10/21/15 03:39 PM S ick. # 2 Mikelopedia @ 10/21/15 04:14 PM I'm feeling hopeful about shoe updates this year in regards to 2k adding shoes to the game. These were added sometime last week. But also, recent updates added a PE Curry 2, Curry lows, and Kobe X Elite Lows. May have been others, but these are the ones I've noticed so far. # 3 TheKnicks7Melo15 @ 10/21/15 04:16 PM Quote: Originally Posted by Mikelopedia I'm feeling hopeful about shoe updates this year in regards to 2k adding shoes to the game. These were added sometime last week. But also, recent updates added a PE Curry 2, Curry lows, and Kobe X Elite Lows. May have been others, but these are the ones I've noticed so far. Yeah I was about to say, these shoes aren't new. # 4 RyanJS08 @ 10/21/15 05:28 PM Those yellow socks # 5 Rams_3 @ 10/21/15 05:31 PM Glad the shoes are in hopefully they continue to scan the hell out of alot of shoes. KEEP EM COMING 2K # 6 Crea8vity @ 10/21/15 05:53 PM Quote: Originally Posted by RyanJS08 Those yellow socks Gosh idk if it's just me but I don't like the Stance sponsorship deal at all. I liked the old ones much better.
